QuestData.Title: Seat of the Triumvirate: The Crest of Knowledge
QuestData.Description: We have all that we need now, $n.$b$bAlleria Windrunner awaits your arrival at the Seat of the Triumvirate.$b$bDo not go alone, my friend. You will need allies to recover the Crest of Knowledge... and endure what L'ura has become.$b$bI will prepare the Vindicaar and await your return. Light be with you in that dark place.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay L'ura and retrieve the Crest of Knowledge.
QuestData.CompletionText: It is a heavy burden I have placed upon you, $n. I have faith you will not fail.

Objectives.Objective: Crest of Knowledge placed on Eredath
